data.definition: High-level language for web development, creating interactive effects, dynamic content, and user interfaces.
JavaScript library for building reusable UI components, ensuring efficient and maintainable web applications.
JavaScript superset adding static typing, enhancing code maintainability and scalability.
JavaScript runtime for building scalable network applications like web servers and APIs.
Framework for building single-page client applications with HTML and TypeScript.
Framework for building web, desktop, and mobile applications.
Object-oriented language used with .NET for building Windows apps, web services, etc.
General-purpose language known for portability, security, widely used for enterprise applications.
Markup language defining web page structure and content using tags.
Style sheet language defining web page presentation and layout.
